name: technician

effect.sun_moon: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.
